episodes.title: ‘Epstein Class’, Epstein Survivors, Dem Women Slam Trump, GOP For “Protecting Paedophiles” | AB1G
episodes.description:
Members of the Democratic Women’s Caucus, led by Pramila Jayapal, stood with survivors of Jeffrey Epstein ahead of Attorney General Pam Bondi’s House Judiciary testimony, demanding accountability and transparency over newly reviewed files. Survivors warned the system protects abusers, not victims, vowing they “will not stop” until justice is delivered. For more details, watch our story and subscribe to our channel, DRM News.

DRM News provides live coverage of the press conference hosted by the Democratic Women’s Caucus, joined by Epstein survivors, ahead of Attorney General Pam Bondi’s testimony before the House Judiciary Committee. Participants address DOJ’s handling of Epstein files, redaction issues, survivor protections, and calls for full transparency and accountability. Watch now for statements, survivor perspectives, and real-time analysis.

episodes.title: FULL REMARKS: Reps. Ro Khanna & Thomas Massie Reveal Hidden Redacted Names in Epstein Files | AC1G
episodes.description:
After reviewing unredacted Jeffrey Epstein files at the US Department of Justice, Reps. Ro Khanna and Thomas Massie say at least six potentially incriminated men remain hidden. They warn key FBI documents were already redacted, fueling demands for transparency and justice for survivors. For more details, watch our story and subscribe to our channel, DRM News.

Epstein Files: Lawmakers Say “Six Men Are Redacted” as DOJ Faces New Transparency Test

Khanna, Massie Flag Hidden Names in Epstein Files, Say DOJ Saw Already-Redacted Records

“We Found Six Men” — Lawmakers Say Epstein DOJ Files Still Hide Key Names

FULL REMARKS: Reps. Ro Khanna & Thomas Massie Reveal Hidden Redacted Names in Epstein Files | AC1G

U.S. Representatives Ro Khanna (D-CA) and Thomas Massie (R-KY), co-authors of the Epstein Files Transparency Act, hold a media availability outside the Department of Justice following their in-person review of Jeffrey Epstein-related files. The lawmakers are expected to provide initial observations, discuss transparency efforts, and address next steps in making the documents public. DRM News delivers live coverage of the briefing with expert analysis and real-time updates. Watch now for direct statements and authoritative context on this bipartisan transparency initiative.

episodes.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Invokes Fifth Before Congress as Epstein Survivors’ Attorney Speaks Out | AC15
episodes.description:
WATCH: Epstein survivors’ attorney Sigrid McCawley weighs in after Ghislaine Maxwell refused to answer questions during a deposition before the U.S. House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

Maxwell, who is serving a 20-year prison sentence following her 2021 conviction for sex trafficking-related charges, invoked her Fifth Amendment right against self-incrimination. Lawmakers from both parties criticized her refusal to testify.

McCawley said Maxwell holds “critical information” about Jeffrey Epstein’s trafficking operation but accused her of repeatedly lying in past proceedings.

The deposition comes as the Justice Department releases millions of documents related to Epstein and as additional high-profile depositions are scheduled.

📍 Fort Lauderdale, Florida / Washington, D.C.
📅 February 6–9, 2026

Lynch cited contradictory statements, document delays, and alleged stalling by the Justice Department as lawmakers demanded transparency and accountability in the Epstein investigation. Democrats allege obstruction by Attorney General Pam Bondi and the DOJ, while Republicans defend enforcement of subpoenas and the necessity of questioning the Clintons. For more details, watch our story and subscribe to our channel, DRM News.

episodes.title: Moonies Cult’ and the Assassination of Abe: Japan’s Most Influential Cult Explored | DRM News
episodes.description:
The killing of Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe shocked people after the killer revealed his motives. Tetsuya Yamagami said he killed Abe because of his links to the ‘Unification Church’, popularly perceived as a ‘cult’ with massive levels of influence in Japan, historically. Known for its mass-weddings, aggressive fundraising campaigns, and the near-messianic presence of its leader Moon, the church wields tremendous influence over its followers. What exactly is this church which has been able to amass such influence in Japan and what kind of criminal activities is it entangled in? 

Credits
Lead reporter: Aiza Nadeem
Video editing and animations: Aiza Nadeem, Abdul Muneeb
Managing Editor: Zia ur Rehman
Chief Editor: Syeda Amna Hassan
